definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: In the intimate circle of Friendlies, Huanhuan is the big brother.
sentences.chinese: 在体内循环的友谊赛，欢欢是大哥哥。

sentences.english: In preparation for your Actua Cup campaign you can practice in friendlies and penalty shootout competitions.
sentences.chinese: 为冠军杯做准备，先在友谊赛和罚点球竞赛中练习。

sentences.english: The two national teams will play a friendly next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 下星期六这两个国家队会打一场友谊赛。

sentences.english: Thomas will be given a chance to impress during tomorrow night's first friendly against Al-Hilal.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯将会在明晚对阿尔希拉尔的友谊赛中出场亮相。

sentences.english: Will we see Pato in action in Friday's friendly against Athletic Bilbao?
sentences.chinese: 我们将在周五对毕尔巴鄂竞技的友谊赛中看见帕托？

sentences.english: Enke's death may bring about the cancellation of Saturday's friendly against Chile.
sentences.chinese: 由于恩克的死，德国周六迎战智利的友谊赛可能取消。

sentences.english: Among the Friendlies, Nini is as innocent and joyful as a swallow.
sentences.chinese: 之间的友谊赛，妮妮是无辜的欢乐和作为一个吞。

sentences.english: I can contact you and your friendlies?
sentences.chinese: 我能联系你门和你们打友谊赛吗？

sentences.english: It is a friendly and he can play up to half-time, or more.
sentences.chinese: 这只是场友谊赛，他可以打半场或者更多的时间。

sentences.english: Among the Five Friendlies, Beibei is known to be gentle and pure.
sentences.chinese: 其中5友谊赛，北碚区是众所周知的温柔和纯洁性。

sentences.english: But every time there are friendlies you get six or seven call-offs.
sentences.chinese: 但每次有友谊赛的话你就有几个球员不能打。

sentences.english: The Club World Cup looks like a friendly tournament.
sentences.chinese: 世俱杯就像一个友谊赛性质的锦标赛。

sentences.english: AC Milan of Italy will play a football friendly in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的ac米兰队将在深圳进行一场足球友谊赛。

sentences.english: A list of all this seasons International Friendlies.
sentences.chinese: 列出所有本赛季国际友谊赛。

sentences.english: Again Capello was demonstrating the usefulness that international friendlies can have when taken seriously.
sentences.chinese: 卡佩罗再次证明了友谊赛是有用的，应该认真对待。

definition: Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
abbr. for 男子足球 men's soccer/abbr. for 男子足球隊|男子足球队 men's soccer team
host/official host (e.g. venue for games or a conference)
to kick/to play (e.g. soccer)/(slang) butch (in a lesbian relationship)
to cross swords/to have a confrontation (with sb)
poised for battle/to square up for a fight
